name: Empty Project
description: Empty project contains the standard empty Cadence folders structure as well as backend and frontend folders. Use this if you want to start from scratch.

name: FCL Dapp
description: Flow Dapp project with preconfigured FCL on the frontend as well as NextJS.

name: Kitty Items
description: CryptoKitties Sample App is a complete NFT marketplace built with Cadence, Flow's resource-oriented smart contract programming language.
